Chinese.name: 文件解壓縮
Chinese.description: 上傳壓縮包至COS時，可觸發雲函數下載壓縮包並解壓，並把解壓後的文件上傳到COS另一個targetBucket環境變量指定的儲存桶中，支援如下壓縮格式：ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZIP2, GZIP, TAR, XZ
Chinese.attention: 該雲函數需要配置COS觸發器，解壓後的文件總大小要<500M，另外在使用本範例代碼時需要函數運作角色有讀寫COS的權限。需要設置如下環境變量：targetBucket-目標儲存桶名稱，targetPrefix-目標儲存桶前綴, targetRegion-目標儲存桶地域, suffix-解壓的後綴

author.name: Top Cloud 無服務器雲函數團隊

English.name: unpack_to_cos
English.description: This demo need to config COS trigger. When archive file has been upload to COS bucket, the SCF will download it to /tmp and unpack it.
English.attention: You should config COS trigger before you use it, and the total size shoud less than 500M after decompression. Please make sure the function have COS read and write permission, and configure environment: targetRegion, targetBucket, targetPrefix and suffix

functions.name: unpack_to_cos
functions.description: 本範例通過配置COS觸發，上傳到COS的壓縮包，使用SCF下載並本地解壓，支援中文欄位解壓，並把解壓後的文件上傳到COS另一個targetBucket環境變量指定的儲存桶中，支援如下壓縮格式：ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZIP2, GZIP, TAR, XZ
